ftdefinition: Including particle size, sorting, roundness and other characteristics.
Porosity is defined as the ratio of pore space in a sediment or sedimentary rock to the total volume of the rock.
ftreferences: Boggs S. Petrology of sedimentary rocks. Cambridge University Press, 2009
Boggs Jr S, Boggs S. Petrology of sedimentary rocks[M]. Cambridge University Press, 2009.
